text: Zoran Đinđić (1 August 1952 – 12 March 2003) was a Serbian politician. He was Prime Minister of Serbia from 2001 until we was assassinated in 2003. He was the mayor of Belgrade in 1997, and long-time opposition politician. Category:1952 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Serbia
title: Zoran Đinđić
